extendedInfo.description: ERE Recruiting Conference & Expo ERE is the premier conference for in-house recruiting leaders. Twice a year, hundreds of in-house recruiting leaders gather for three days of sharing what's new, what's now, and what's next. ERE is developed specifically for in-house recruiting leaders who run a department, manage a team, control the budget and have responsibility for talent acquisition in your organization. Visit http://www.ererecruitingconference.com for more information on current and upcoming conferences.Keywords - Recruitment, Recruiting, ERE, ERE Expo, SHRM, HR Technology, LinkedIn Talent
